data.title: Strathclyde Partnership for Transport
data.meta_description: SPT subsidises local bus services in areas not served by commercial bus operators. Timetables for these services are provided below. For commercial services visit the operators' website, use the timetable finder below or call Traveline Scotland on 0871 200 2233.
data.text:
Govan Bus Station - Silverburn - Southpark Village - Thornliebank - Shawlands

From Sunday 27 April 2024 for approximately 15 months Thornliebank Road, at the rail bridge will be closed to facilitate Network Rail bridge works. During these works service 49 will operate an amended timetable and route. Journeys will divert from Thornliebank Road via Burnfield Road, Fenwick Road, Orchard Drive, Orchard Park Avenue picking up normal route from Main Street. The same diversion will operate in reverse.

Govan – Pollokshields – Mount Florida – Victoria Infirmary

From Monday 28 August 2023 until Friday 30 August 2024 Shields Road will be closed between St Andrews Drive and Scotland Street due to Network Rail's bridge demolition works. Service 121 will operate normal route to Scotland Street then via West Street, Wallace Street, Eglinton Street, Pollokshaws Road, Albert Drive, Darnley Street picking up normal route from St Andrews Drive. Shields Road will not be served during these works.
